headlines.description: Rafael Gaglianone kicked a 29-yard field goal with 2:27 left to lift No. 23 Wisconsin to a 23-21 victory against Southern California in the Holiday Bowl on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gaglianone's 29-yard field goal lifts Badgers over USC

headlines.description: Jeremy Johnson came off the bench to run and pass for a touchdown, lifting Auburn to a 31-10 victory over Memphis Wednesday in the Birmingham Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: Johnson lifts Auburn past Memphis 31-10 in Birmingham Bowl

events.name: NC State Wolfpack at Mississippi State Bulldogs

headlines.description: Dak Prescott closed out his college career in impressive fashion, throwing for a Belk Bowl-record 380 yards and four touchdowns in Mississippi State's 51-28 victory over North Carolina State on W
headlines.shortLinkText: Prescott, Mississippi State top NC State 51-28 in Belk Bowl

events.name: Texas A&M Aggies at Louisville Cardinals

notes.headline: FRANKLIN AMERICAN MORTGAGE MUSIC CITY BOWL

headlines.description: Lamar Jackson ran for a career-high and Music City Bowl-record 226 yards and two touchdowns and threw for two more scores to help Louisville beat Texas A&M 27-21 on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lamar Jackson has 4 TDs, Louisville beats Texas A&M 27-21
